title: Part 3: Starknet Token Design
short_desc: The design of the StarkNet Token is shaped by the need to power a network that is composed of (i) Users of StarkNet, (ii) Operators — people providing the network with computing resources that perform sequencing of transactions, generation of STARK proofs, and long-term storage providers, and (iii) Developers writing software for its infrastructure and for applications running on it.
